title: 308. Q&AF: Owning Multiple Businesses, Money Within Relationships & Increasing Your Prices
itunes:title: 308. Q&AF: Owning Multiple Businesses, Money Within Relationships & Increasing Your Prices
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on if you should entertain owning multiple businesses or go all-in on your current business, what's the best way to handle finances as a couple, and how to effectively communicate to your customers about price increases during inflation.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on if you should entertain owning multiple businesses or go all-in on your current business, what's the best way to handle finances as a couple, and how to effectively communicate to your customers about price increases during inflation.
